profile: Artiste Renovations & Contracting specializes in interior renovations including kitchens, bathrooms, basement developments and whole house make-overs including additions. Our attention to detail and customer service have made us one of Edmonton's finest.  Fully licenced and insured.  A+ BBB member. Top quality craftsmanship with integrity. www.artisterenos.ca .
service_area: Edmonton, St. Albert, Sherwood Park, Spruce Grove, Stony Plain, Leduc, Beaumont
services: Basement Development; Kitchen Remodeling; Bathrooms; Additions and complete interior makeovers
licenses: City of Edmonton ; St. Albert; Alberta Pre-paid Contractors
memberships: BBB of Central and Northern Alberta
warranty_terms: 1 year complete; Fixtures as per manufacturer's warranty

profile:
Welcome to B & L Construction. We pride ourselves on quality work. We will be there on time and until the job is finished to customer satisfaction. No job is too big or small. We have some great financing terms are available. We are currently offering OAC, a 3.99% interest rate over 60 months up to $60,000. 

***

Contact us today for more information and the schedule an appointment. We're looking forward to working with you!

profile: Five Star Bath Solutions of Edmonton is advancing the bathroom renovation industry through innovative technology, custom products, and attention to customer service. Using innovative software, Five Star Bath Solutions professionals will deliver a detailed estimate for your bathroom renovation project. We believe in setting standards for how projects are estimated, installed, and completed.
products:
New Acrylic tubs
showers
Wall surrounds, shower doors,safety products
Vanities, toilets, painting and flooring also available
services:
We can install a new tub or shower with a wall surround in 1 day. We also install vanities toilets, flooring and painting is available.
Zero threshold shower with grab bars and many other safety products available.
brands:
Maxx     Mirolin 
Moen     Delta
Sentrel  Premium Acrylic
American Standard
Toto
specialities:
We can remove the old bathtub and replace it with and new tub or shower base completed in 1 day.
Dont cover the problem, get rid of it!
name: Bath Solutions Of Edmonton
